title: New function needed:transfer with different character encoding standards
body: There are many character encoding standards such as UNICODE\UTF-8\UTF-16\UTF-32\UCS\ANSI\GBK\GB2312 and so on. The default that in golang is utf-8. But many times we received others, or we need to send with others , and it's hard for us to deal with. I wonder if golang can support official way to deal with the problem, that means, we can translate the character from one encoding way to another.
